alert.note: Alert for Etowah (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Etowah County through 645 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slackland, or 7 miles northeast of Gadsden, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gadsden, Reece City, Ballplay, Tabor Road, Noccalula Falls, Black Creek, Northside, Wilsonia, Crudup and Keener. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
